title: Lubrication Engineers font?
content:
Hello!

I am seeking this font. Desperately :)

Company is here:  
 [http://www.lelubricants.com/about-us.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131853/http:/www.lelubricants.com/about-us.html "http://www.lelubricants.com/about-us.html")

Yours,  
Pekka Varis  
Finland

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LE_logo_120810_6479.gif)

Font: 

 Neue Aachen, Aachen 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131853/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: pekkisszz

comments.content: Colin Brignall's [Aachen](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131853/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/aachen), manually slanted as they're is no Italics (part of the recently released [Neue Aachen](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131853/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/neue-aachen)) and with a custom /C
